title: Blondy and the Magic Robot
backCoverBlurb: Blondy is a young inventor with big ideas! Join her as she builds a friendly robot friend and discovers that with a little creativity, anything is possible.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy and energetic smile. She is wearing blue denim overalls.

pages.text: Blondy's room was full of boxes and shiny tape. I want to build something new! she said. Point to a box.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is wearing her denim overalls and is surrounded by colorful boxes and craft supplies in her room.

pages.text: She found a silver box and two bright lights. Flash! They glowed like stars. It was a robot!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is holding two small, glowing electronic lights and looking at them with wide, excited eyes.

pages.text: Blondy worked all day. Twist, turn, tape! She felt very focused and smart.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is using a small screwdriver and colorful tape to build a robot made of boxes.

pages.text: Finally, the robot was ready. Hello, Blondy! it said in a funny, metallic voice. Whirr-beep!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing in front of a cute robot made of silver boxes that has glowing red eyes.

pages.text: The robot helped Blondy pick up her blocks. Klunck, klunck! went the wooden pieces.
pages.imagePrompt: The silver box robot is picking up colorful wooden blocks from the floor while Blondy watches with a delighted smile.

pages.text: Wow! My invention really works! Blondy cried. Can you dance like a robot? Beep-boop!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is dancing with her robot, moving her arms in stiff, 'robotic' motions and laughing.

pages.text: Blondy felt so empowered and clever. Being an inventor was the best job ever.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing with her hands on her hips, looking very proud and confident in her room.

pages.text: They shared a snack of sweet, crunchy carrots. Munch, munch! Everything was better with a friend.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting on the floor, eating a carrot and offering one to her robot friend.

pages.text: The workshop was a place of magic and ideas. What will you build next? Draw it in the air!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is pointing a pencil at a large sheet of paper, looking very inspired and happy.

pages.text: The sun went down and the room became quiet and cozy. Shhh... time to rest for the next idea.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting in the soft evening light, looking content and peaceful in her workshop.

pages.text: Blondy tucked her robot in a special bed. Goodnight, robot, she whispered with a sweet smile.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is covering the robot with a small blanket and looking very caring and kind.

pages.text: Goodnight, Blondy. Sleep tight and dream of amazing new inventions. You are a star!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A peaceful close-up of Blondy sleeping soundly, looking empowered and safe in her bed.
